pageContext.html:
Provide a unified global configuration for components.

Usage

import { configure, getConfig } from 'choerodon-ui';

configure({ prefixCls: 'c7n' });

const prefixCls = getConfig('prefixCls');

API

Property Description Type Default Supported version
prefixCls Set uniform style prefix string c7n
proPrefixCls Set uniform style prefix (pro component) string c7n-pro
iconfontPrefix Icon style prefix string icon
icons Icon list, used for IconPicker. string[] | { [categoryName: string]: string[] } import { categories } from 'choerodon-ui-font'
ripple Whether to turn on the ripple effect boolean true
cacheRecords 默认缓存选中和变更的记录 boolean 1.5.6
lookupCache Lookup cache configuration. maxAge - cache duration max - maximum number of caches object { maxAge: 1000 _ 60 _ 10, max: 100 }
lookupUrl lookup address or return address hook string | ((code: string) => string) code => /common/code/${code}/\
lookupAxiosConfig The configuration or hook of the value list request, seeAxiosRequestConfig. The default url in the configuration is lookupUrl, and the method is post. AxiosRequestConfig | ({ dataSet: DataSet, record: Record, params?: any, lookupCode: string }) => AxiosRequestConfig -
lookupAxiosMethod 值列表请求的类型 Http method 'post'
lovDefineUrl Lov hook to get the configured address or return address string | ((code: string) => string) code => /sys/lov/lov_define?code=${code}\
lovDefineAxiosConfig Return the configuration or hook of the request of Lov configuration, see AxiosRequestConfig for details. The default url in the configuration is lovDefineUrl, and the method is post. AxiosRequestConfig | (code: string, field?: Field) => AxiosRequestConfig -
lovQueryUrl Lov value address or return address hook string | ((code: string) => string) code => /common/lov/dataset/${code}\
lovQueryAxiosConfig Lov query data request configuration or hook, see AxiosRequestConfig for details. The default url in the configuration is lovQueryUrl, and the method is post. AxiosRequestConfig | (code: string, lovConfig?: LovConfig, {dataSet, params, data }) => AxiosRequestConfig -
lovTableProps 全局配置lov的tableProps,当同时存在lovTableProps以及的时候会进行一层合并 TableProps | (multiple?: boolean) => TableProps {}
lovModalProps Lov pop-up window properties, see ModalProps ModalProps
lovAutoSelectSingle Lov 点击查询仅存在一条数据时自动选中且不弹窗 boolean false 1.3.2
lovTableCustomizable Lov 弹窗中 Table 是否显示个性化设置入口按钮 boolean false 1.3.2 ~ 1.4.5
lovNoCache 默认 Lov noCache boolean 1.5.6
lovQueryBar 默认 Lov Table 的 queryBar string normal 1.4.4
lovQueryBarProps 默认 Lov Table queryBar 的 queryBarProps object 1.4.4
lovQueryCachedSelected lov 查询缓存已勾选记录 (code: string, cachedSelected: Map<string, Record>) => Promise<object[]> 1.4.4
lookupBatchAxiosConfig Return the hook of lookup batch query configuration, see AxiosRequestConfig for details. (codes: string[]) => AxiosRequestConfig
useLookupBatch 是否使用批量查询快码 (code: string, field: Field) => boolean noop 1.6.0
selectReverse Whether to enable the pull-down multi-select reverse function. boolean true 1.0.0
selectSearchable 是否开启下拉搜索功能。 boolean false 1.3.1
selectBoxSearchable 是否开启勾选框搜索功能。 boolean false 1.5.7
selectReserveParam 多选下拉搜索时，是否保留查询参数。 boolean true 1.5.7
selectPagingOptionContent 渲染分页 option ReactNode ··· 1.3.1
selectTrigger 下拉弹出触发方式 Action[] ['focus', 'click'] 1.4.4
axios Replace the built-in axios instance AxiosInstance
dataKey dataKey of the default DataSet string rows
autoCount 默认 DataSet 的 autoCount boolean true 1.5.5
totalKey default DataSet totalKey string total
countKey 默认 DataSet 的 countKey string needCountFlag 1.5.5
statusKey The key that identifies the status in the data submitted by the default DataSet string __status
tlsKey The key that identifies multiple languages ​​in the default DataSet data string __tls
status The state mapping of the data submitted by the default DataSet {add: string, update: string, delete: string} {add:'add', update:'update', delete:'delete'}
labelLayout labelLayout of the default Form string horizontal
queryBar queryBar of the default Table string normal
queryBarProps 默认 Table queryBar 的 queryBarProps object 1.4.4
tableVirtual default virtual of Table boolean 1.4.3
tableVirtualCell default virtualCell of Table boolean 1.4.2
tableBorder Default Table border boolean true
tableHighLightRow Default Table current line highlight, 可选值: boolean | focus | click, true - 始终显示高亮行, 'click' - 点击行后始终显示高亮行， 'focus' - 表格获焦时显示高亮行 boolean true
tableSelectedHighLightRow Default Table currently checked row highlight boolean false
tableRowHeight 默认 Table 行高 auto | number | ({ size }) => number | auto 30
tableHeaderRowHeight 默认 Table 头行高 auto | number | ({ size }) => number | auto tableRowHeight 1.5.2
tableFooterRowHeight 默认 Table 脚行高 auto | number | ({ size }) => number | auto tableRowHeight 1.5.2
tableExpandIcon Default Table custom expanded icon (( prefixCls, expanded, expandable, needIndentSpaced, record, onExpand }) => ReactNode
tableSpinProps Properties of the default Table spin SpinProps {size: Size.default, wrapperClassName:''}
tableButtonProps Default TableButton properties ButtonProps {color:'primary', funcType:'flat'}
tableButtonsLimit 默认 Table 头部显示功能按钮的数量，超出限制放入更多下拉 number 1.4.5
tableCommandProps Default TableCommand properties ButtonProps {color:'primary', funcType:'flat'}
tableAlwaysShowRowBox Whether Table always displays rowbox, after opening it will also display rowbox in other modes boolean false
tableShowSelectionTips Table 默认显示选中记录提示 boolean false 1.3.0
tableShowCachedTips Table默认显示缓存记录提示， 优先级高于 tableShowSelectionTips boolean false 1.5.6
tableShowSortIcon Table默认显示可排序icon boolean false 1.6.0
tableUseMouseBatchChoose Whether to use the mouse for batch selection of the Table. After opening, you can drag the mouse to batch selection in the rowbox, press at the beginning rowbox, and release at the end position boolean false
tableEditorNextKeyEnterDown Table 是否开启可编辑行回车编辑下一行 boolean true
tableColumnResizable Default Table column resizable boolean true
tableColumnResizeTrigger 表格列宽拖拽分割线触发方式 mouseDown | hover mouseDown 1.5.1
tableColumnHideable Default Table column hideable boolean true 1.2.0
performanceTableColumnHideable 默认 performanceTable 列可调整显示 boolean true 1.4.3
tableColumnTitleEditable Default Table column title editable boolean false 1.4.3
performanceTableColumnTitleEditable 默认 performanceTable 列可编辑标题 boolean false 1.4.3
tableColumnDraggable Default Table column draggable boolean false 1.2.0
tableColumnResizeTransition Excessive effect of column dragging boolean true 1.5.7
tableHeightChangeable Default Table heightChangeable boolean true 1.5.1
performanceTableColumnDraggable performanceTable 是否开启列拖拽 boolean false 1.4.3
performanceTableAutoHeight performanceTable 是否开启自动高度，传入对象则自适应父节点高度，为 true 则由内容撑开高度 boolean | {type: 'minHeight' | 'maxHeight', diff: number} false 1.5.6
tableRowDraggable Default Table row draggable boolean false 1.2.0
tableDragColumnAlign Default align of Table row drag handler left|right
tableAutoFocus Table automatically focuses on new rows to the first editable field boolean false
tableColumnOnCell Custom cell property configuration ( dataSet, record, column) => object 1.3.2
tableColumnAlign 默认表格列对齐方式 (column, field) => 'left' | 'center' | 'right' | undefined Function 1.4.4
tableColumnDefaultWidth 默认表格列宽度, 只在出横向滚动条时起作用 number 100 1.5.0
tableColumnDefaultMinWidth 默认表格列最小宽度 number 50 1.5.0
tableColumnFilterPopover 默认表格渲染不同前端筛选组件 (props: FilterPopoverProps) => ReactNode 1.6.0
tableAggregationColumnDefaultWidth 默认表格聚合列宽度, 只在出横向滚动条时起作用 number 250 1.5.0
tableAggregationColumnDefaultMinWidth 默认表格聚合列最小宽度 number 50 1.5.0
tableKeyboard Table Open or close the new shortcut button event boolean false
tableFilterAdapter Table 筛选条请求适配器 ({ type, config, searchCode, queryDataSet} )=>AxiosRequestConfig 1.4.4
tableFilterSuffix Table filter bar button reserved area ReactNode 1.0.0
tableAutoHeightDiff Table automatic height error value configuration number 80
tableFilterSearchText Table filter bar quick search parameter name string params
tableParityRow Default Table odd and even rows boolean 1.1.0
tableCustomizedSave Table 个性化保存的钩子 (code, customized) => void (code, customized) => localStorage.setItem(table.customized.${code}, JSON.stringify(customized)) 1.2.0 ~ 1.4.5
tableCustomizedLoad Table 个性化加载的钩子 (code) => Promise (code) => Promise.resolve(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(table.customized.${code}) || 'null')) 1.2.0 ~ 1.4.5
tableCustomizable Table 是否显示个性化设置入口按钮 boolean false 1.3.0 ~ 1.4.5)
confirm 变更检查行为自定义，可与modifiedCheckMessage关联使用(source - 修改提示信息来源 查询条：'query' 翻页： undefined) (message: any, dataSet?: DataSet, source?: string) => Promise async (message) => (await confirm(message)) !== 'cancel'
customizable 是否开启个性化 boolean | Customizable false 1.4.5
customizedSave 个性化保存的钩子 (code, customized, component: keyof Customizable) => void (code, customized) => localStorage.setItem(table.customized.${code}, JSON.stringify(customized)) 1.4.5
customizedLoad 个性化加载的钩子 (code, component: keyof Customizable) => Promise (code) => Promise.resolve(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(table.customized.${code}) || 'null')) 1.4.5
tableShowRemovedRow 默认 Table 是否显示临时移除的行，默认置灰显示 boolean true 1.4.4
performanceTableCustomizable performanceTable 是否显示个性化设置入口按钮 boolean false
pagination Default pagination attributes TablePaginationConfig | false See Pagination
defaultActiveFirstOption 默认 Select 高亮第一个选项 boolean true 1.5.0-beta.0
dropdownMatchSelectWidth The default drop-down box matches the width of the input box boolean true
modalSectionBorder The head and feet of the default Modal have border lines boolean true
modalOkFirst The default Modal ok button is ranked first boolean true
modalKeyboard Does Modal support keyboard esc off boolean true
modalAutoCenter Whether Modal is centered by default boolean false
modalMaskClosable 点击蒙层是否允许关闭，可选 boolean | click | dblclick boolean | string false 1.2.0
modalResizable modal是否可调整大小 boolean 1.5.2
modalMovable modal是否可移动 boolean 1.5.3
modalClosable modal关闭按钮 boolean 1.5.6
drawerSectionBorder Default if drawer header and foot have a border line boolean true 1.3.0
drawerTransitionName 抽屉模式使用的动画， 可选值： 'slide-right' 'slide-left' 'slide-up' 'slide-down' string 'slide-right' 1.3.0
drawerHeaderFooterCombined 抽屉模式头脚组合展示 boolean false 1.5.5
drawerOkFirst By default, the ok button of Modal drawer is ranked first, and the priority is higher than modalOkFirst boolean | undefined undefined
buttonFuncType Default Button function type string raised
buttonColor The color of the default Button string default
autoInsertSpaceInButton 设置为 true 时，添加按钮中 2 个汉字之间的空格 boolean false 1.5.5
renderEmpty Custom component empty state. The value that componentName will receive is Table Select. These two inputs need to be processed when implementing the function. **Note that Table and Select need to be processed at the same time. The default value refers to the source code's defaultRenderEmpty (componentName: string) => ReactNode
defaultValidationMessages Custom validation messages, see ValidationMessages ValitionMessages
validationMessageFormatter 校验信息格式器 ValidationMessageFormatter: (message?: string, injectOptons?: any) => Promise | any (message, injectOptions) => message && injectOptions ? formatReactTemplate(message, injectOptions) : message
validationMessageReportFormatter 校验报告信息格式器 ValidationMessageReportFormatter: (message: any) => Promise<string | undefined> | string | undefined (message) => getReactNodeText(<span>{message}</span>)
generatePageQuery 分页参数转换的钩子 ({ page?: number, pageSize?: number, totalCount?: number, count?: 'Y' | 'N', defaultCount?: 'Y' | 'N', onlyCount?: 'Y' | 'N', sortName?: string, sortOrder?: string, sort?: string[] }) => object -
feedback DataSet query and submit data feedback configuration, see Feedback Feedback
transport DataSet default transport, see Transport Transport
formatter Date formatting. Among them, jsonDate is the format of data request and response. When it is empty, the date will be converted to timestamp. See Formatter for details Formatter
useColon Whether a colon is used in the Form, when it is turned on, a colon will be added after all labels, and the required * number will be moved to the front boolean false
collapseExpandIconPosition Global configuration collapse icon position left | right left
collapseExpandIcon Global configuration collapse custom switch icon (panelProps) => ReactNode | text (preset icon + expand and collapse text)
collapseTrigger Global configuration switch panel trigger position header | icon header
textFieldAutoComplete Globally configure the autoComplete property of textField Optional values: on off
resultStatusRenderer Customized status display, can overwrite the existing status display, can also increase the status display, support global configuration object -> {string:react.ReactNode}
numberFieldNonStrictStep Globally configure the nonStrictStep property of NumberField boolean false
numberFieldFormatter NumberField格式器 FormatNumberFunc: (value: string, lang: string, options: Intl.NumberFormatOptions) => string
numberFieldFormatterOptions NumberField格式器参数,可以与组件值进行合并 FormatNumberFuncOptions: { lang?: string, options?: Intl.NumberFormatOptions }
currencyFormatter Currency格式器 FormatNumberFunc: (value: string, lang: string, options: Intl.NumberFormatOptions) => string
currencyFormatterOptions Currency格式器参数,可以与组件值进行合并 FormatNumberFuncOptions: { lang?: string, options?: Intl.NumberFormatOptions }
exportMode Export mode selection: front-end export, back-end export client | server client
showLengthInfo 全局配置是否展示长度信息 boolean 1.4.0
showInvalidDate 显示无效日期 boolean 1.4.0
showRequiredColorsOnlyEmpty 只有在空值时显示必填背景色和边框色 boolean 1.4.0
showValidation 校验信息提示方式 tooltip | newLine tooltip 1.4.4
showHelp 显示提示信息的方式 tooltip | newLine | label | none newline 1.5.0
highlightRenderer 高亮渲染器 ({ title, content, dataSet, record, name, className, style }, element) => ReactNode 1.4.0
performanceEnabled 开启性能监控 { Table: boolean } { Table: false } 1.4.1
tooltip 是否开启提示, 参数 target 详见 TooltipTarget Tooltip.always | Tooltip.overflow | Tooltip.none | function(target) 1.4.4
tooltipTheme Tooltip 主题 或 返回主题的钩子, 参数 target 详见 TooltipTarget dark | light | function(target) (target) => target === 'validation' ? 'light' : 'dark' 1.4.4
tooltipPlacement Tooltip 位置 或 返回位置的钩子, 参数 placement 详见 TooltipPlacement placement | function(target) TooltipPlacement 1.5.0
attachment 附件上传配置 AttachmentConfig 1.4.4
tabsInkBarStyle Tabs 墨条样式 CSSProperties 1.4.5
numberFieldKeyboard control UP DOWN keyboard events for NumberField component boolean true 1.5.0
dateTimePickerOkButton 日期时间控件是否显示确定按钮 boolean false 1.5.4
lovShowSelectedInView Lov 多选时，viewMode 为 modal 或 drawer，在对话框中显示已选记录 boolean | (viewMode) => boolean (viewMode) => viewMode === 'drawer' 1.5.0
lovSelectionProps Lov 显示已选记录时的参数 SelectionProps 1.5.2
onPerformance 性能监控埋点函数 (type, event) => void 1.4.1
onTabsChange Tabs 变更事件， 初始化时也会触发， 可用于监控埋点 (props: { activeKey:string, activeGroupKey?:string, title: string, groupTitle?:string, code?:string }) => void 1.5.2
onButtonClick 按钮点击事件， 可用于监控埋点 (props: { title:string, icon?:string }) => void 1.5.2
onComponentValidationReport 组件触发校验报告事件 (props: { showInvalid: boolean; component: object }) => void 1.5.4
min 最小值 min: (FieldType) => value 1.5.2
max 最大值 max: (FieldType) => value 1.5.2
xlsx 异步获取 xlsx 库 () => import('xlsx') 1.5.2
uploadShowReUploadIcon 基础 Upload 组件文件上传失败后是否显示重新上传按钮。当 listType 为 picture-card: true 为 icon, text 为文字形式; 其他 listType 都为文字形式 boolean | 'text' | (file: UploadFile, listType: UploadListType) => (boolean | 'text') 1.5.6
fieldMaxTagCount 默认 FormField 的 maxTagCount 属性 boolean 1.5.6
fieldMaxTagPlaceholder 默认 FormField 的 maxTagPlaceholder 属性 ReactNode | (omittedValues: any[]) => ReactNode 1.5.6
fieldFocusMode 字段聚焦模式 checked | focus checked 1.5.7
formAutoFocus Form 表单内自动聚焦第一个可编辑组件，表单在 Modal 弹窗内需要手动将 Modal 的 autoFocus 设置为 false boolean false 1.6.0

Property Default Type Supported version

week YYYY-Wo string

ValidationMessages

Property Default Value Type Supported version
badInput Please enter a number. ReactNode
patternMismatch Please enter a valid value. ReactNode
rangeOverflow {label} must be less than or equal to {max}. ReactNode
rangeUnderflow {label} must be greater than or equal to {min}. ReactNode
stepMismatch Please enter a valid value. The closest valid value is {0}. ReactNode
stepMismatchBetween Please enter a valid value. The two closest valid values ​​are {0} and {1} respectively. ReactNode
tooLong Please reduce the content to {maxLength} characters or less (you currently use {length} characters). ReactNode
tooShort Please add this content to {minLength} or more characters (you currently use {length} characters). ReactNode
typeMismatch Please enter a valid value that matches the type. ReactNode
valueMissing Please enter {label}. ReactNode
valueMissingNoLabel Please fill in this field. ReactNode
uniqueError The field value is duplicated, please fill in again. ReactNode
unknown Unknown error. ReactNode

help 帮助信息

属性 说明 默认
table-cell 表格单元格 'right'
button 按钮
label 表单控件标签
select-option 表单控件标签
output Output 'right'
validation 校验信息 'bottomLeft'
help 帮助信息

AttachmentConfig

1.4.4 版本支持, 参数 isPublic 1.5.0 支持。

属性 说明 类型 默认值 版本
defaultFileKey 上传文件的参数名 string file
defaultFileSize 上传文件的大小限制, 单位 B number 0
defaultChunkSize 上传分片文件的大小, 单位 B number 5 * 1024 * 1024 1.5.2
defaultChunkThreads 上传分片文件的并发数 number 3 1.5.2
downloadAllMode 显示全部下载按钮模式，支持 readOnly | always string readOnly 1.6.0
action 上传的 axios 请求配置或返回 axios 请求配置的钩子 AxiosConfig | ({ attachment: AttachmentFile, chunk: AttachmentFileChunk, bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?:string, attachmentUUID: string, isPublic?: boolean }) => AxiosRequestConfig
batchFetchCount 批量获取附件数量 (attachmentUUIDs: string[], { isPublic?: boolean }) => Promise<{[key as string]: number}>
fetchList 查询附件列表 ({ bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?:string, attachmentUUID: string, isPublic?: boolean }) => Promise<FileLike[]>
fetchFileSize 查询附件大小限制 ({ bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?:string, isPublic?: boolean }) => Promise
getPreviewUrl 获取预览地址，默认使用 AttachmentFile.url ({ attachment: AttachmentFile, bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?:string, attachmentUUID: string, isPublic?: boolean }) => string
getDownloadUrl 获取下载地址，返回值类型为函数时作为按钮的点击事件，默认使用 AttachmentFile.url ({ attachment: AttachmentFile, bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?:string, attachmentUUID: string, isPublic?: boolean }) => string | Function ({ attahment }) => attachment.url
getDownloadAllUrl 获取全部下载地址，返回值类型为函数时作为按钮的点击事件 ({ bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?:string, attachmentUUID: string, isPublic?: boolean }) => string | Function
getTemplateDownloadUrl 获取模板下载地址 ({ bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?:string, attachmentUUID: string, isPublic?: boolean }) => string | Function | Promise<string | Function> 1.5.5
getAttachmentUUID 获取附件的UUID ({ isPublic?: boolean }) => Promise | string
renderIcon 附件列表项的前缀图标渲染函数 (attachment: AttachmentFile, listType: 'text'| 'picture' | 'picture-card', defaultIcon: ReactNode) => ReactNode
renderHistory 渲染操作历史 ({ attachment: AttachmentFile, bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?:string, attachmentUUID: string }) => ReactNode
onBeforeUpload 上传前的回调 (attachment: AttachmentFile, attachments: AttachmentFile[], props: { useChunk?: boolean, bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?: string, isPublic?: boolean }) => boolean | undefined | PromiseLike<boolean | undefined> 1.5.2
onBeforeUploadChunk 上传分片前的回调 ({ chunk: AttachmentFileChunk, attachment: AttachmentFile, bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?: string, isPublic?: boolean }) => boolean | undefined | PromiseLike<boolean | undefined> 1.5.2
onUploadSuccess 上传成功的回调 (response: any, attachment: AttachmentFile, props: { useChunk?: boolean, bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?: string, isPublic?: boolean }) => void
onUploadError 上传出错的回调 (error: Error, attachment: AttachmentFile) => void
onOrderChange 排序变化回调，用于发送排序请求 (attachments: AttachmentFile[], { isPublic?: boolean }) => void
onRemove 删除文件回调，用于发送删除请求, 返回 false 或抛出异常将中止删除 ({ attachment: AttachmentFile, bucketName?: string, bucketDirectory?: string, storageCode?:string, attachmentUUID: string, isPublic?: boolean }, multiple: boolean) => boolean

1.5.0 版本支持

属性 说明 类型
secretFieldEnable 获取是否开启数据操作保护 () => boolean
secretFieldTypes 获取验证方式以及验证号码 () => object[]
secretFieldFetchVerifyCode 校验验证码 (type: string) => Promise< object>
secretFieldQueryData 获取真实数据 ({type: string, _token: string, fieldName: string, captchaKey: string, captcha: string, action: string }) => Promise
secretFieldSaveData 保存编辑后的数据 ({ _token: string, fieldName: string, value: string }) => Promise

AxiosRequestConfig

Property Description Type
url address string
method method string
baseURL base address string
headers request header object
params url parameter object
data Request body data object
timeout Request timeout time number
withCredentials Used to pass cookies across domains boolean
transformRequest Transform the submitted data (data: any, headers: any) => string
transformResponse Transform response data (data: any, headers: any) => any

For more configuration, please refer to Axios official documents, or refer to typescript file/node_modules/axios/index.d.ts
